name: industries_list_best_performing
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webull.
Tool description: Query public data for investment products including stocks, fractional shares, options, ETFs, and ADRs as on webull.com
API description: Retrieves a list of the best performing industries for a given region.

regionid.description: The ID of the region for which to list best performing industries.

industrytype.description: The time period for evaluating industry performance. One of 'today', '5d', '1m', or '3m'. Default is 'today'.

pagesize.description: The number of results per page. Maximum is 20. Default is 20.

pageindex.description: The index of the page to retrieve. Default is 1.

direction.description: The order direction of the results. Use -1 for descending and 1 for ascending. Default is -1.
